snippet: The body of Menachem Stark, 39, a prominent Hasidic real estate developer who was abducted on Thursday, was discovered in a trash bin.
abstract: New York City Police say the charred body of Menachem Stark, prominent Brooklyn-based real estate developer who was kidnapped, has been found in a smoldering trash bin outside a Long Island gas station.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and JULIE TURKEWITZ

lead_paragraph: The body of Menachem Stark, 39, a prominent Hasidic real estate developer who was abducted on Thursday, was discovered in a trash bin.

headline.main: Charred Body of Kidnapped Man Is Found on Long Island
headline.print_headline: Charred Body of Kidnapped Man Is Found on Long Island
